content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<link href="style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
</head>
<body>

<h1><center>Welcome to My Website</center></h1>
<p><h4>A little bit about me:</h4></p>
<ul> First off my name is Jose Jimenez, but  all of my friends call me UnbentSea or Unbent for short. As to the story of how my nickname came to be, it was given to me by a couple friends who created my gamer tag on Xbox. I come from a relatively big family, buy my immediate family is really small, as I only have 1 sibiling, my sister. I am currently studying to get my BS in Computer Science at Arizona State University. I've always felt that my spirit animal is a Polar Bear, just becuase I like to hibernate, and rarely go outside. I also highly prefer the cold weather.</ul>


<center><img src="polar-bear-2.jpg" alt="Beautful Polar Bears" Title="Polar Bears Swimming" style="width:700px;height:350px;"></center>
<p><center><a href="resume.html">My Resume</a></center></p>

</body>
</html>
